QuestData.Title: Wave Two
QuestData.Description: You've stirred up the hornets, $n. The ceiling is coming down on us! And their strongest fighters are taking wing on creatures warped and twisted by this world of flame.$B$BGet back out there and take them down! Watch out for flaming boulders.
QuestData.LogDescription: Equip a Twilight Firelance and fly Aviana's Guardian. Kill 10 Twilight Lancers by flying into them. Press the flap button to flap your mount's wings!
QuestData.CompletionText: FLAP! For the love of all things merciful, flap. Flap harder!
QuestData.RewardText: By the wings of Aviana - you were born to fly, $n!$B$BQuickly, let's get back out there and hit them again...
